pages.title: Water Generator
pages.text: The Water Generator is a creative only part that acts as a constant source of water for an $(l:bigreactors:reactor/active)actively cooled$(/l) Reactor.$(br2)This part automatically supplies one bucket of water to the Coolant Fluid Tank, but only when the Reactor is turned on.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() Reinforced$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Creative mode:$() this part is only available in creative mode and there is no crafting recipe for it.
